mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SECU_T_LOCK u WHERE (u.APPID = #{APPID} and u.OBJECTID = #{TABLEID} and u.TYPEID = '4') or (u.APPID = #{APPID} and u.TYPEID = '2' and u.OBJECTID = #{AGENCYID}) or (u.APPID = #{APPID} and u.TYPEID = '1' and u.OBJECTID = #{DEPTID}) or (u.APPID = #{APPID} and u.TYPEID = '3' and u.OBJECTID = #{TABLEID}) or (u.APPID = #{APPID} and u.TYPEID = '6' and u.OBJECTID in (select suitid from dict_t_suit t1 start with t1.SUITID = (select t4.SUITID from dict_t_model t4 where t4.TABLEID = #{TABLEID} and t4.APPID = #{APPID}) connect by prior t1.SUPERID = t1.SUITID) and u.TOID = #{AGENCYID}) or (u.APPID = #{APPID} and u.TYPEID = '7' and u.OBJECTID in (select suitid from dict_t_suit t1 start with t1.SUITID = (select t4.SUITID from dict_t_model t4 where t4.TABLEID = #{TABLEID} and t4.APPID = #{APPID}) connect by prior t1.SUPERID = t1.SUITID) and u.TOID = #{DEPTID})

select * from ( SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'1' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '0' as LOCKFLAG FROM CODE_T_DEPT T where not exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '1' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID) union SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'1' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '1' as LOCKFLAG FROM CODE_T_DEPT T where exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '1' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID) ) order by OBJECTCODE
select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '3' and l.APPID = #{appId}

select * from ( SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'1' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '1' as LOCKFLAG FROM CODE_T_DEPT T where exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '1' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID)) order by OBJECTCODE

select * from ( SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'1' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '0' as LOCKFLAG FROM CODE_T_DEPT T where not exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '1' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID) ) order by OBJECTCODE
mapper.delete:
delete from secu_t_lock where typeid='5' and objectId in
#{lockData.objectId}

delete from secu_t_lock where typeid='4' and objectId in
#{lockData.objectId}

delete from secu_t_lock where typeid='6' and objectId=#{tableId} and appId=#{appId} and toId in
#{lockData.toId}

delete from secu_t_lock where typeid='7' and objectId=#{tableId} and appId=#{appId} and toId in
#{lockData.toId}
mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'2' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '0' as LOCKFLAG FROM ${dbNameForAgency} T where T.levelno='3' and not exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '2' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID) union SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'2' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '1' as LOCKFLAG FROM ${dbNameForAgency} T where T.levelno='3' and exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '2' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID)) order by OBJECTCODE

select * from ( SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'2' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '1' as LOCKFLAG FROM ${dbNameForAgency} T where T.levelno='3' and exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '2' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID)) order by OBJECTCODE

select * from( SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'2' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '0' as LOCKFLAG FROM ${dbNameForAgency} T where T.levelno='3' and not exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '2' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID)) order by OBJECTCODE

select * from ( SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'3' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '0' as LOCKFLAG FROM ${dbNameForAcctItem} T where not exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '3' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID) union SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'3' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '1' as LOCKFLAG FROM ${dbNameForAcctItem} T where exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '3' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID)) order by OBJECTCODE

select * from (SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'3' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '1' as LOCKFLAG FROM ${dbNameForAcctItem} T where exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '3' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID)) order by OBJECTCODE

select * from ( SELECT #{appId} as APPID,'3' as TYPEID, GUID as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, CODE as OBJECTCODE, '0' as LOCKFLAG FROM ${dbNameForAcctItem} T where not exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '3' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.GUID)) order by OBJECTCODE

select * from ( SELECT '5' as TYPEID, APPID as OBJECTID, APPNAME as OBJECTNAME, APPID as OBJECTCODE, '0' as LOCKFLAG FROM dict_t_appregister T where not exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '5' and l.OBJECTID = t.APPID) union SELECT '5' as TYPEID, APPID as OBJECTID, APPNAME as OBJECTNAME, APPID as OBJECTCODE, '1' as LOCKFLAG FROM dict_t_appregister T where exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '5' and l.OBJECTID = t.APPID)) order by OBJECTCODE

select * from ( SELECT '5' as TYPEID, APPID as OBJECTID, APPNAME as OBJECTNAME, APPID as OBJECTCODE, '1' as LOCKFLAG FROM dict_t_appregister T where exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '5' and l.OBJECTID = t.APPID)) order by OBJECTCODE

select * from ( SELECT '5' as TYPEID, APPID as OBJECTID, APPNAME as OBJECTNAME, APPID as OBJECTCODE, '0' as LOCKFLAG FROM dict_t_appregister T where not exists (select * from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '5' and l.OBJECTID = t.APPID)) order by OBJECTCODE

select * from (select '4' as TYPEID, #{tableId} as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, (select count(*) from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '4' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.tableId) as LOCKFLAG from dict_t_model T where t.TABLEID = #{tableId} and t.APPID = #{appId})
where lockflag='${islock}'
order by OBJECTID

select '4' as TYPEID, tableId as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, (select count(*) from secu_t_lock l where l.TYPEID = '4' and l.APPID = #{appId} and l.OBJECTID = t.tableId) as LOCKFLAG from dict_t_model T, (select t.suitId from Dict_t_Suit t start with t.SUITID =#{tableId} and t.APPID =#{appId} connect by prior t.SUITID = t.superid) t2 where t.SUITID = t2.suitid

select '4' as TYPEID, tableId as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, '0' as LOCKFLAG from (select t.* from dict_t_model T, (select t.suitId from Dict_t_Suit t start with t.SUITID = #{tableId} and t.APPID = #{appId} connect by prior t.SUITID = t.superid) t2 where t.SUITID = t2.suitid) t3 where not exists (select * from (select t5.OBJECTID from secu_t_lock t5, (select t.* from dict_t_model T, (select t.suitId from Dict_t_Suit t start with t.SUITID = #{tableId} and t.APPID = #{appId} connect by prior t.SUITID = t.superid) t2 where t.SUITID = t2.suitid) t6 where t5.OBJECTID = t6.tableId and t5.APPID = #{appId} and t5.TYPEID = '4') t7 where t3.tableId = t7.objectId)

select '4' as TYPEID, tableId as OBJECTID, NAME as OBJECTNAME, '1' as LOCKFLAG from (select t.* from dict_t_model T, (select t.suitId from Dict_t_Suit t start with t.SUITID = #{tableId} and t.APPID = #{appId} connect by prior t.SUITID = t.superid) t2 where t.SUITID = t2.suitid) t3 where exists (select * from (select t5.OBJECTID from secu_t_lock t5, (select t.* from dict_t_model T, (select t.suitId from Dict_t_Suit t start with t.SUITID = #{tableId} and t.APPID = #{appId} connect by prior t.SUITID = t.superid) t2 where t.SUITID = t2.suitid) t6 where t5.OBJECTID = t6.tableId and t5.APPID = #{appId} and t5.TYPEID = '4') t7 where t3.tableId = t7.objectId)

select t2.guid as toId, '['|| t2.code ||']'||t2.name as objectName,#{tableId} as objectId,'0' as lockFlag from ${dbNameForAgency} t2 where t2.levelno='3' and not exists (select t1.* from secu_t_lock t1 where t1.TYPEID = '6' and t1.appId = #{appId} and t1.OBJECTID = #{tableId} and t2.guid = t1.toId) union select t2.guid as toId, '['|| t2.code ||']'||t2.name as objectName,#{tableId} as objectId,'1' as lockFlag from ${dbNameForAgency} t2 where t2.levelno='3' and exists (select t1.* from secu_t_lock t1 where t1.TYPEID = '6' and t1.appId = #{appId} and t1.OBJECTID = #{tableId} and t2.guid = t1.toId)

select t2.guid as toId, '['|| t2.code ||']'||t2.name as objectName,#{tableId} as objectId,'0' as lockFlag from ${dbNameForAgency} t2 where t2.levelno='3' and not exists (select t1.* from secu_t_lock t1 where t1.TYPEID = '6' and t1.appId = #{appId} and t1.OBJECTID = #{tableId} and t2.guid = t1.toId)

select t2.guid as toId, '['|| t2.code ||']'||t2.name as objectName,#{tableId} as objectId,'1' as lockFlag from ${dbNameForAgency} t2 where t2.levelno='3' and exists (select t1.* from secu_t_lock t1 where t1.TYPEID = '6' and t1.appId = #{appId} and t1.OBJECTID = #{tableId} and t2.guid = t1.toId)

select t2.guid as toId, t2.name as objectName,#{tableId} as objectId,'0' as lockFlag from code_t_dept t2 where not exists (select t1.* from secu_t_lock t1 where t1.TYPEID = '7' and t1.appId = #{appId} and t1.OBJECTID = #{tableId} and t2.guid = t1.toId) union select t2.guid as toId, t2.name as objectName,#{tableId} as objectId,'1' as lockFlag from code_t_dept t2 where exists (select t1.* from secu_t_lock t1 where t1.TYPEID = '7' and t1.appId = #{appId} and t1.OBJECTID = #{tableId} and t2.guid = t1.toId)

select t2.guid as toId,t2.name as objectName,#{tableId} as objectId,'0' as lockFlag from code_t_dept t2 where not exists (select t1.* from secu_t_lock t1 where t1.TYPEID = '7' and t1.appId = #{appId} and t1.OBJECTID = #{tableId} and t2.guid = t1.toId)

select t2.guid as toId, t2.name as objectName,#{tableId} as objectId,'1' as lockFlag from code_t_dept t2 where exists (select t1.* from secu_t_lock t1 where t1.TYPEID = '7' and t1.appId = #{appId} and t1.OBJECTID = #{tableId} and t2.guid = t1.toId)
